SERVICE.name: Tender
SERVICE.COMMENT: This service implements the Tender Use Case of the Tender Package.

ROAD.name: GiftCardNumberEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is used when configuration allows gift card number to be entered in the POS UI for tender.

ROAD.name: GiftCardNumberNotEntered
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is used when configuration requires the gift card number to be entered in 3rd party payment application.

ROAD.name: GiftCardEntryCancel
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is taken when operator chooses to cancel the gift card entry.

ROAD.name: GiftCardEntryUndo
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is taken when the operator chooses to undo the gift card entry.

REGION.SITE: !-- End: Adding 13.3 code in to be able to handle the Debit Refund -->
